overview: In the shadow of the pandemic, a small town rallies to protect a beloved local bookstore. A landmark in Lenox, Massachusetts, The Bookstore is a magical, beatnik gem thanks to its owner Matt Tannenbaum, whose passion for stories runs deep. This  portrait of The Bookstore and the family at its heart offers a journey through good times, hard times, and the stories hidden on the shelves.
title: Hello, Bookstore
